name: synchronize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ I or T ] to (cause to) happen at the same time: The show was designed so that the lights synchronized with the music.
[ T ] When people synchronize their watches, they make sure that all their watches show the same time: We'd better synchronize our watches if we all want to be there at the same time.

to cause something to happen in a planned way at exact times: The traffic lights were synchronized to allow cars to go at 30 mph and not have to stop for a red light.
If you synchronize clocks or watches, you change them so that they all show the same time.
